form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Marriage Certificate of Palmesois Benoit and of Genia Fervil, 020543

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 LIBERTY EQUALITY FRATERNITY REPUBLIC OF HAITI MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE NO. 020543 Extract from the registries of marriage certificate of the commune of Cavaillon, filed in the National records of the Republic. On January thirtieth, nineteen hundred and fourty seven at eight o'clock in the morning. I undersigned Cure of Cavaillon certify after the publication done any opposition Palmesois Benoit a farmer thirty years old born at Benoit fifth rural section of Cavaillon Domiciled at Benoit son of Talain Benoit, a farmer and of Ysmera Seizeme a farmer domiciled At Benoit. And Genia Fervil a farmer thirty years old born at Bacon fifth rural section of Cavaillon Domiciled at Benoit same section daughter of Vilmeus Fervil a farmer, deceased and of Catherinise Guillaume a farmer domiciled at Bacon. Have been presented for the marriage celebration. As the questioned if they consented to take each other for spouse they have answered both separately And affirmatively in the presence of the qualified witnesses name below: Lisima Fervil a farmer Fourty five years old domiciled at Bacon fifth section cavaillon and Mrs. Alteus Bury a farmer fourty Six years old domiciled at Marc Laserre same section. Signed Lud Briere, Pierre Verpile Officer of the civil state of the commune of Cavaillon. Certify and testify have transcribe in the registries of marriage certificate of this commune. PORT-AU-PRINCE, on February 14, 2002 Certify true copy. JEAN WILFRID BERTRAND : GENERAL DIRECTOR YEAR: 1947 PAGE: 171 NUMBER: 130 MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE OF: PALMESOIS BENOIT AND OF GENIA FERVIL BY THESE MOTIVES, The court after examination and the conclusion of the public ministry, ordered the rectification of The marriage certificate drawn on January thirtieth, nineteen hundred and fourty seven by the Officer Of the civil state of Cavaillon. Said it will be write in the bottom of the certificate. Palmesois Benoit, instead of Palmesoy; son of Talain Benoit, a farmer and of Ysmera Seizeme a farmer domiciled at Benoit instead of son of Calin Benoit a farmer and of Erxemera Suzemai a farmer domiciled at Benoit and in margin Marriage certificate of Palmesois Benoit and of Genia Fervil. Ordered the inscription of the present judgement On the registries of the said officer of the civil state and his mention in margin of the said certificate. Do defense to all depositaries of the said registries to delivered extract copy or expedition without the Rectification ordered. It was judge and pronounced by us, Lise Pierre Pierre, super intendent in civil audience and public that day January twenty second two thousand two, with 199th years of the Independence in the presence of Mr. Rocky Pierre substitut of the commissary of the government with the assistance of the clerk of the court Fritz Victorin. PORT-AU-PRINCE, on February 14, 2002 JEAN WILFRID BERTRAND GENERAL DIRECTOR Unique for the legalization of the signature of Mr. Jean Wilfrid Bertrand General Director Mr. Josue Pierre Louis : Commissary of the Government
